digital_lending.title: Digital Lending Platform Disclosure Requirements
digital_lending.description: All digital lending platforms must display comprehensive fee structure and terms clearly
digital_lending.content: Digital lending platforms shall ensure that all fees, charges, interest rates, and other terms are disclosed prominently and transparently to borrowers before loan disbursement.

digital_lending.title: Customer Data Protection in Digital Lending
digital_lending.description: Strict data privacy and protection requirements for customer information
digital_lending.content: Digital lending platforms must implement robust data protection measures and obtain explicit consent for data collection, processing, and sharing.
